variable.name: STUDY
variable.description: DbGaP top-level (parent) study and/or substudy accession: phs000287=parent study; phs000301=substudy; phs000377=substudy; phs000400=substudy; phs000226=substudy

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Use of subject's sample (please note that different platforms may have been employed for the same sample use, e.g. SNP_Array. SNP_Array: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; SNP_PCR: SNP genotype obtained using PCR; SNP_Sequence: SNP genotypes derived from sequence data; WES_SRA: Whole exome sequencing data available through SRA
